CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Validate_Billing_Address__c=true, Validate_Shipping_Address__c=true, Validate_Communication_Language__c=true, Validate_Customer_Category__c=true, Validate_Customer_Discount_Group__c=true, Validate_Emails_Required__c=true, Validate_Shipping_Rule__c=true, AgodiUpdateInProgress__c=true, Validate_Courier_Info__c=true, Validate_Block_Reason_Deactivated__c=true, ValidateLegalNameBlank__c=true, Validate_VAT_Max_Chars__c=true, Validate_Website__c=true, Validate_VAT_Number_Required__c=true, ValidateFirstNameLastName__c=true, Validate_Invoicing_Frequency__c = true), true,false )
CustomField.label: Validate Integration errors
